00026 class DRMLogger {
00027 public:
00034   DRMLogger(IMutex* mtex = 0): drmLog(), logMutex(mtex) {
00035   }
00036 
00041   virtual ~DRMLogger() {
00042     if (logMutex != 0) {
00043       if (logMutex->Lock() == false) return;
00044     }
00045     FILE* logfile = fopen("drmplugin.log", "wt");
00046     if (logfile != NULL) {
00047       fprintf(logfile, "%s\n", drmLog.data());
00048       fclose(logfile);
00049     }
00050     if (logMutex != 0) {
00051       logMutex->Release();
00052       delete logMutex; logMutex = 0;
00053     }
00054   }
00055 
00058   virtual void ResetLog() {
00059     if (logMutex != 0) {
00060       if (logMutex->Lock() == false) return;
00061     }
00062     drmLog = std::string();
00063     if (logMutex != 0) {
00064       logMutex->Release();
00065     }
00066   }
00067 
00070   virtual void UpdateLog(const std::string& message) {
00071     if (logMutex != 0) {
00072       if (logMutex->Lock() == false) return;
00073     }
00074     drmLog += (message + "\n");
00075     if (logMutex != 0) {
00076       logMutex->Release();
00077     }
00078   }
00079 
00082   virtual std::string GetLog() {
00083     if (logMutex != 0) {
00084       if (logMutex->Lock() == false) return "";
00085     }
00086     std::string ret = drmLog;
00087     if (logMutex != 0) {
00088       logMutex->Release();
00089     }
00090     return ret;
00091   }
00092 
00093 protected:
00094   std::string drmLog;
00095   IMutex* logMutex;
00096 };
